startseite.intro: INDUSTRY LEADERS AND PUBLIC ADMINISTRATIONS TRUST OUR VIDEO CREATION:

flextop.heading1: From Input Text to E-Learning Video
flextop.heading2: The Most Efficient Way to Create Corporate Knowledge
flextop.paragraph: FAST AI Movies is the only AI solution for automatically creating custom E-Learnings - from colleagues to colleagues. You don't need complex scripts; your employees can turn existing documentation/descriptions into interactive E-Learnings in minutes. Learning psychology insights ensure high comprehensibility.

function.description: You provide your company's corporate design specifications, upload an input text, and select the desired speaker for the voiceover of your video. The result: A customized training video that precisely meets your specifications.

Schrit.Step1Description: Choose your colors and fonts and upload your logo.
Schrit.Step2Title: You can upload existing product sheets, compliance regulations,
Schrit.Step2Description: Upload existing product sheets, compliance regulations, etc. in the text field. You can also enter your process descriptions and bullet points. Screenshots can be included.
Schrit.Step3Description: Choose your preferred audio settings, export formats, features, and your preferred template.
Schrit.Step4Description: The video is automatically generated by our AI software. Once completed, you will receive a download link via email.
Schrit.Step5Description: You can easily update the e-learning later using the editor. Simply change the corresponding text passages.
Schrit.CreateDemoVideo: Create a demo video for free

compliance.Description: Ensure legal compliance in your organization. With our technology, you can clearly and concisely convey legal requirements such as money laundering laws, supply chain laws, and new technologies like ChatGPT.

produktschulungen.Description: You reduce the working time and increase the product knowledge of your employees. With the help of our technology you can explain product properties and discuss them scientifically for Excellent customer service and sales.

subclasses.p1: Make complex operating procedures easily understandable – with the help of our technology, create animated manuals that support the correct use of your products, both internally and for customers.
subclasses.p2: Ensure safety in the workplace. Using our technology, provide information on proper behaviors and health protection measures to promote the well-being of employees.
subclasses.p3: Promote sustainable and responsible practices in your company. Utilizing our technology, create customized Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) trainings that convey values and practices, enhancing awareness among your employees.

Maschinenbau.Title: Mechanical Engineering
Maschinenbau.Description: In the mechanical engineering segment, our e-learnings are used to train factory workers on new internal software applications and to inform the entire workforce about new product developments.

ÖffentlicheVerwaltung.Title: Public Administration
ÖffentlicheVerwaltung.Description: Counties and cities can use our e-learnings to effectively and sustainably inform employees and civil servants about new processes during challenging digitalization.

FinanceInsurance.Title: Finance & Insurance
FinanceInsurance.Description: Sensitive compliance guidelines can be safely and sustainably communicated to employees thanks to efficient e-learnings. In addition, complex financial products and insurance processes can be presented in a simple context.

Unternehmensberatungen.Title: Management Consulting
Unternehmensberatungen.Description: Thanks to interactive e-learnings, management consultancies can efficiently document the processes of their clients and thus expand cooperation.

Benefit1.Title: Short Deployment Time
Benefit1.Description: Our software reduces video creation time by over 90% compared to traditional agencies, enabling rapid training implementation.

Benefit2.Title: Low Costs
Benefit2.Description: With a cost saving of over 85% compared to agencies, our solution offers enormous savings potential in video production.

Benefit3.Title: Direct & Fast Content Creation
Benefit3.Description: Users can create content directly from existing documents such as datasheets or emails, without the need to write complex scripts.

Benefit4.Title: High Understanding
Benefit4.Description: Supported by educational psychology expertise, our platform offers interactive and easy-to-understand e-learning.

Benefit5.Title: GDPR Compliant
Benefit5.Description: We ensure data protection with our own AI models and server location in Frankfurt, independent of OpenAl.

Benefit6.Title: Custom & Targeted
Benefit6.Description: Our software enables tailor-made training videos that integrate corporate design and accurately address the target audience.

Dataprivacy.TITLE: Data Privacy
Dataprivacy.SUBTITLE: How Do We Ensure the Security of Your Data?
Dataprivacy.SECURE_TRANSMISSION_DESC: Data is encrypted and transmitted to a server in Germany.
Dataprivacy.VIDEO_STORAGE_LOCATION_DESC: The video is securely stored on a German server.
Dataprivacy.DATA_ENTRY_DESC: Data is entered in our web app.
Dataprivacy.INTERNAL_PROCESSING_DESC: Data is processed in compliance with data protection regulations using our own AI models, without calling the OpenAI API.
Dataprivacy.SECURE_DISPLAY_DESC: The video is securely displayed in the web app.

numcircles.description1: Data privacy starts with entering your data directly into our user-friendly web app. We ensure that this initial step is secure and intuitive.
numcircles.description2: Once you enter your data, it is encrypted and securely transmitted to a server in Germany. This encryption ensures that your data is protected from unauthorized access during transmission.
numcircles.description3: After transmission, our advanced AI models, developed without the OpenAI API, come into play. These models process your data in strict compliance with data protection regulations. Your privacy is in good hands with us.
numcircles.description4: The videos we create are stored on a secure server in Germany. This ensures that your data always remains under the strict German data protection legislation.
numcircles.description5: Finally, the video is securely presented in our web app. We ensure that the video display is as secure as all previous steps. You can trust that your data is protected from start to finish.

topstory.title: THE STORY
topstory.heading: The creation of FAST AI Movies
topstory.desc: Our journey began with our founder Florian Scherl's vision of making employee training efficient for every company. Even before he graduated from high school in May 2022, Florian laid the foundation for our company by officially founding it. Our success story quickly gained momentum:
topstory.1des: We drew attention by winning the renowned Startup Teens competition and receiving funding from Al+Munich.
topstory.2des: Our first big breakthrough in the industry came with our first customer in the mechanical engineering segment.
topstory.3des: Our team grew to five dedicated and talented members.
topstory.4des: The launch of our web app marked an important milestone in our development.
topstory.5des: The launch of our web app marked an important milestone in our development.
topstory.6dec: Our company grew to 15 members, each one an expert in their field.
topstory.7dec: We expanded our AI software to generate e-learnings for public administration
topstory.8dec: We expanded our AI software to generate e-learnings for public administration
topstory.9dec: Our presence at major industry events such as Bits & Pretzels and Websummit demonstrated our ambitions and growing importance in the industry. We also expanded our influence into the finance and insurance industries.

section1.content: In the age of digitization, efficient training processes and rapid adaptation to new technologies are crucial. The district of Neuburg-Schrobenhausen has taken a pioneering role in this regard by relying on innovative solutions to train its employees effectively and digitize administration. The collaboration with FAST AI Movies, a provider of AI-driven training videos, is a key part of this endeavor.

section2.contentLeft: The Neuburg-Schrobenhausen district recognizes that the automation and digitization of training processes offer significant added value to the administration. Using the FAST AI Movies software, high-quality training videos are created for process training and internal software training. These videos are not only cost-effective but also highly effective. An outstanding example of successful collaboration is the training for form application for process recording. Creating training for this simple yet important administrative task allows employees to save time and focus more efficiently on their tasks. The training videos are interactive and include multiple-choice quiz questions to ensure that the learned knowledge is understood.
section2.contentRight: The collaboration with the Neuburg-Schrobenhausen district is an outstanding example of how AI-driven training videos can drive sustainable change in administration through digital transformation. Our technology enables training content to be based on simple text foundations and creates highly effective training videos.

section3.content: Florian Scherl, CEO of FAST AI Movies,

section4.contentLeft: Christian Färber, Digitalization Officer of the district, adds: "In the introduction of AI support for training videos, we see great potential to explain the increasingly complex specialist applications and process workflows to our employees. We are proud to take the lead in digitization and show other districts how they can benefit from this technology." The qualitative advantages of these innovative training videos are diverse. They provide consistent training content that is easily accessible to all employees and allow individual time management for learning. This leads to increased knowledge levels and improved employee satisfaction. In addition, training results can be tracked, enabling the evaluation and continuous improvement of training processes.
section4.contentRight: The successful collaboration between the Neuburg-Schrobenhausen district and FAST AI Movies is a prime example of how digital transformation can fundamentally change administration. This success story should serve as inspiration for other districts looking to embark on the path to efficient training and digitization of their administrative processes.

jobspage.joinUsTitle: Become a part of FAST AI Movies!
jobspage.joinUsDescription: FAST AI Movies is a highly innovative AI start-up that generates training videos for medium-sized companies automatically with the help of AI. The customer only provides FAST AI Movies with a short input script, and everything else is generated by the AI Software. We empower our team to own their projects end to end and actively contribute throughout the product life cycle. To accelerate your growth path, you will work in a highly innovative tech start-up directly with the NLP lead and the founder.
jobspage.projectStudyTitle: Project Study in Business Development (Compliance/Legal Market Segment)

section1.title: Project Study in Business Development
section1.subtitle: (compliance/legal market segment)
section1.description: FAST AI Movies is looking for motivated TUM students who want to carry out a project study in the field of Business Development (developing new market opportunities for compliance training videos) to take our video creation AI software to the next level!

section3.title: YOUR ROLE
section3.points11: Identify a new market segment (compliance training/legal training)
section3.points12: Use Design Thinking methods to identify new market opportunities.
section3.points13: Conduct market research to identify the innovators.

section4.title: SKILLS AND EXPERTISE
section4.points1: Identify a new market segment (compliance training/legal training)
section4.points2: Use Design Thinking methods to identify new market opportunities.
section4.points3: Conduct market research to identify the innovators.

section5.title: YOUR PROJECT STUDY
section5.points6: Start date: as soon as possible
section5.points7: Regular 1:1 with FAST AI Movies CEO
section5.points8: If you have fellow students, bring them on board!
section5.points9: We provide a rough structure but inside this structure, you can work completely independently.
section5.points10: We have our own office at TUM Incubator in Garching. If you want, you can work mostly remotely, but we will organize a few office days anyway, since nothing beats meeting physically regularly and exchanging ideas.

JoinComponent.title: JOIN US
JoinComponent.subtitle: Become a part of FAST AI Movies!
JoinComponent.content: Feel free to send us an email with your CV as well as your GitHub Account and preferred start date to jobs@fast-ai-movies.de!
JoinComponent.supervisedBy: The project study is supervised by Dr. Mathias Fromberger (Chair of Corporate and Intellectual Property Law, TUM School of Management): Mathias.fromberger@tum.de
JoinComponent.lookingForward: Looking forward to having you onboard!

news.title: FAST AI Movies in the Media
news.address: #28// Learn from an entrepreneur: Florian Scherl, Founder at FAST AI Movies
news.epdesc: In this week's episode, Antonie meets Florian Scherl, founder of FAST AI Movies. Florian founded his company while being 17 years old and still being a pupil. Florian takes us on his journey of how he learned coding, identified the opportunity for FAST AI Movies, but also of the importance of intensely listening to what your customers want.
news.fonderinfo: Florian Scherl, Founder at FAST AI Movies
news.founderjorney: Despite Florian's age, he is advancing very fast in AI and business. At 13 years old, he taught himself programming and then AI. In our chat today, we talk about Florian's unique journey into his passion for AI.
news.contentfounder: FAST AI Movies | Presentation | Campus Founder

section1.title: Masterful Methods: Successful Learning in E-Learning

section2.title: Digital Knowledge: The Psychology of Successful E-Learning

cont1.title: Masterful Methods: Successful Learning in E-Learning

cont2.title: Digital Knowledge: The Psychology of Successful E-Learning

subscribe.privacyPolicy: By clicking Subscribe, you agree to our Privacy Policy

learningIntroduction.intro: The way we learn has changed significantly in the digital age and e-learning has emerged as a significant form of education. E-learning offers learners the flexibility to learn from anywhere and advance at their own pace. However, to fully realize the benefits of e-learning, effective learning strategies are crucial. In this discussion, we will take a look at the best learning strategies specifically tailored for eLearning. From self-motivation to time management to active interaction with learning material, we will explore how learners can successfully navigate the digital education environment. Applying these strategies can make the difference between superficial understanding and deep, sustained learning, ultimately promoting success in eLearning courses.

learningIntro.cont: The way we learn has significantly changed in the digital age, and E-Learning has evolved into a significant form of education. E-Learning provides learners with the flexibility to study from anywhere and to further their education at their own pace. However, to fully leverage the benefits of E-Learning, effective learning strategies are crucial. In this discussion, we will take a look at the best learning strategies specifically tailored to E-Learning. From self-motivation to time management and active interaction with learning materials – we will explore how learners can navigate successfully in the digital educational environment. The application of these strategies can make the difference between a superficial understanding and a deep, sustainable learning experience, ultimately promoting success in E-Learning courses.

rewardSystem.heading: Successful learning in e-learning
rewardSystem.text: It is also helpful to set rewards for yourself when you achieve specific milestones to maintain motivation. Reward yourself, for example, with a short break, a small treat, or a moment of relaxation after completing a particular task.
rewardSystem.text2: However self-motivation can fluctuate and there are times when that make you feel less motivated. In such moments it is important to rely on discipline. Follow your study plan and set clear expectations for yourself. Even if the If motivation is missing, discipline can then contribute continuously Achieve progress
rewardSystem.text3: Finally, the inclusion of other people, be it in form of learning partners or mentors, your self-motivation strengthen. Share your goals and progress with others to support each other and stay motivated. Self-motivation is a key to successful e-learning, as it helps you stay on track and achieve your learning goals to reach.
rewardSystem.text4: Effective time management is crucial to get the most out of your eLearning experience. There E-learning is often effective time management crucial to getting the most out of your Get the best e-learning experience. Because e-learning is often flexible and you can set your own learning times, it is important to proceed in a disciplined and structured manner.
rewardSystem.Text5: Start by creating a learning plan that... Course content, goals and deadlines taken into account. Sit down clear and realistic learning goals for each day or week to track progress. Don't forget buffer times to plan for unexpected events or additional exercises.
rewardSystem.text6: Use technology to support your time management. Calendar apps or to-do lists can help with study times to organize and set reminders for important deadlines to set up.
rewardSystem.text7: In addition, it makes sense to increase your personal productivity take into account. Identify your most productive times day and plan challenging tasks during it time window. Breaks are also important to reduce fatigue avoid and maintain concentration
rewardSystem.text8: Finally, flexibility is an important aspect of the time management. It's okay to adjust the schedule if unexpected obligations arise, as long as you make sure that you can make up for the lost learning time later.
rewardSystem.text9: Well-thought-out time management allows you to achieve your Cope with e-learning courses efficiently, reduce stress and ensure. that you have enough time for understanding and Deepen the course material...
rewardSystem.text10: Active learning is a key aspect of being successful Completing e-learning courses. Instead of passive information you become an active learner through active learning Participants in the educational process. This can deepen your understanding and improve knowledge retention.
rewardSystem.text11: A proven method of active learning is to ask Questions. Ask yourself what you already know want to learn and how new information fits into your existing ones Knowledge fits. Write down questions that arise during the Learning arise and try to answer them.
rewardSystem.text12: Practical application of the knowledge learned is also important central aspect of active learning. Solve exercises, lead Do experiments or put what you have learned into practical use Applications around if possible. This promotes not only that understanding, but also strengthens practical skills.
rewardSystem.text13: ​ 260 / 5,000 Translation results Translation result Active learning also requires that you incorporate the material into your put your own words and create summaries. This compels You to process what you have learned and organize it Keeping easier.
rewardSystem.text14: Overall, active learning helps you not only absorb information, but actually understand it and can apply. This promotes and enables sustainable learning it allows you to apply what you have learned to your professional and personal life to apply.
rewardSystem.text15: Interaction plays a prominent role in e-learning as it can enrich and deepen the learning process. Through the Interaction with other learners, teachers and the course material you can develop a deeper understanding and of benefit from different perspectives.
rewardSystem.text16: One of the most common forms of interaction in E-learning environments are online discussion forums or chat rooms. Here you can ask questions, exchange views and hear from the Benefit from the experiences of others. This interaction does not promote only understanding, but also creates a feeling of Community and learning in a group..
rewardSystem.text17: Interacting with teachers or tutors is also decisive. Use those available Means of communication to receive clarifications and feedback to obtain. Teachers can provide valuable insight and additional Provide resources to support your learning success.
rewardSystem.text18: Interacting with the course material itself should not be overlooked become. Active participation by solving exercises and quiz questions and practical tasks deepen their understanding and enable them allow you to apply your knowledge.
rewardSystem.text19: If possible, also form study groups to learn together work and learn from each other. studying together, Discussing and explaining what you have learned can help fill gaps in understanding close and different perspectives receive.
